title: Presistent XSS: Cross-Site-Scripting, dangures and how to prevent.
info: taking a look at presistent xxs:cross-site-scripting. there are multiple issues to look out for with xxs, presistent xxs being one of them. i will now take a look at how an presistent xxs attack is preformed and how we try to prevent it.

title: Reflective XSS: Cross-Site-Scripting.
info: Taking a look at Reflective XXS:Cross-Site-Scripting. There are multiple issues to look out for with XXS, reflective xxs being one of them. I will now take a look at how an reflective XXS attack is preformed and how we try to prevent it.
